----
创建一个文件,按照ledger的格式,书写.

== 基本命令 ==
显示分类收入和支出
ledger -f my.dat bal

显示每条信息
ledger -f my.dat reg

显示每条信息和累计信息
ledger -f my.dat reg Checking

== 常用词汇 ==
- Expenses		支出
    - food
    - rent
    - supplies
- revenue
    - business income
    - gifts received
- Assets		资产
    - checking
    - cash
- Income		收入
- Salary		工资
- Liabilities	负债
    - credit card
[[-]] Asset = Liability + Equity
- Asset + Expense = Liabilit + Equity + Income
